column1: Lámatyávë (pl. lámatyáver) is a noun in Quenya which refers to Wikipedia:Phonaesthetics of the Elves. It means "sound-taste" and refers to individual pleasure in the sounds and forms of words.
Lámatyávë was practiced when Elves Essecilme. pp.215
Sound-taste was an important factor in Tolkiens created names and languages and by extension
